features: Vacuum Insulated Water Bottle: Made of double wall 18/8 food-grade stainless steel, BUZIO ThermoArmour water bottle keeps liquids icy for up to 48 hours or hot for up to 24 hours.

3 Caps Pack, 100% Leak-Proof: BUZIO stainless steel water bottle comes with 3 lids: portable handle lid, easy-twist spout lid, and flip-up straw lid to meet camping, hiking, cycling, fitness sports and more. Each lid has a thickened 360° seal for 100% leak-proof.
Food-Grade Materials: Made of non-toxic BPA-free plastics & durable food-grade 18/8 stainless steel, BUZIO insulated water bottle is puncture-resistant, hard to oxidize, and prevents flavor transfer.

There is Always One for you: BUZIO insulated water bottle meets your imagination in all aspects of drinking, from the comprehensive sizes (32oz-64oz) to classical and stylish designs, from the production materials to convenient accessories. Come to BUZIO, there is always one for you.

Super Deal Combo: Buy 64oz insulated water bottle, get 7 accessories, a worry-free lifetime warranty, and friendly customer service. BUZIO water bottle with a delicate packaging box works as a perfect gift for your loved ones.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: BUZIO ThermoArmour Technology BUZIO patent ThermoArmour technology is known to use only the most rigorously selected material and state-of-the-art workmanship. Featuring 100% 18/8 food-grade stainless steel, BUZIO water bottles keep your beverages fresh and authentic with zero oxidation and decomposition hazard.

Previous page Simply open it with one hand to quench your thirst while you are on the go. Unleash an oasis of coolness with a simple twist while the heat rises on your road trip. Uncap to drink through the wide mouth and cap to bring your bottle wherever life takes you. Next page 1 Flip-Up Straw Lid 2 Easy-Twist Spout Lid 3 Portable Handle Lid
The Merge of Modern and Classic

BUZIO is a forever evolving brand and its powder-coat technology is one of its most classic pinnacles. Non-slip sweat-free finish allows steady grip in any condition. The coat lasts through daily wear and tear and won't fade or crack, so that each bottle is housed in the freshest hue.

Waste Reduction & Sustainability BUZIO is dedicated to building a sustainable eco-system by cutting back on the use of single-use plastics. Promise of Lifetime Quality Service BUZIO believes a good bottle should last a lifetime, and we want to make sure yours does too! That’s why we offer BUZIO Lifetime Lifetime Quality Service. BUZIO Gallon Jug with Straw Lid BUZIO gallon insulated water bottle is designed for bold initiatives in outdoor explorations. It's tested and approved by the most avid sportsmen for being the ultimate solution to outdoor hydrations. SHOP BUZIO 30oz Insulated Tumbler with Handle BUZIO tumbler with 2 in1 lid and straw allows you to suck or sip as you wish. SHOP

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Reliable Thirst Quencher
reviews.reviewText: The 64 oz Water Bottle has been my go-to companion for staying hydrated throughout the day. This stainless steel insulated water flask jug is a game-changer, providing me with a generous half-gallon capacity to keep me refreshed on even the busiest days.One of the standout features of this water bottle is the convenient straw lid. It allows for easy sipping without the need to unscrew the cap, making it a breeze to take a quick drink during workouts, hikes, or on the go. The straw lid is also leak-proof, ensuring I can toss the bottle into my bag without any worries of spills.The stainless steel construction of the water bottle ensures it can withstand the rigors of daily use and outdoor adventures. The double-walled insulation keeps my beverages icy cold for hours, making it perfect for hot summer days or long hikes. Likewise, it keeps hot drinks warm, ideal for chilly mornings or winter outings.The half-gallon capacity is ideal for those who strive to drink plenty of water throughout the day. With this bottle by my side, I no longer worry about constant refills, as it provides me with ample hydration to keep me going.The handle on the cap is an added bonus, making it easy to carry and providing a comfortable grip when I'm on the move. Additionally, the wide mouth design allows for easy cleaning, and I've found that it's even large enough to fit ice cubes for an extra refreshing drink.I also appreciate the durable build of the BUZIO water bottle. It has proven to be reliable and long-lasting, showing no signs of wear or dents despite my regular use. The quality materials used in its construction give me the confidence that it will continue to perform well for a long time.In conclusion, the bottle with straw lid has become an essential part of my daily routine. Its generous capacity, efficient insulation, and leak-proof design make it a top-notch choice for those looking to stay hydrated on the go. Whether I'm at the gym, on a hike, or simply running errands, this water bottle has never let me down. If you're seeking a reliable and durable hydration solution, the water bottle is definitely worth considering.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very well made. Keeps the water cold. Very nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great!!! Absolutely worth it!!
reviews.reviewText: Apparently I didn’t read the full description, so I was pleasantly surprised when I received a bag to carry the bottle in - not only the bottle with 3 lids, two straws, and a straw cleaning brush. The bag is necessary because I got the 64oz (half gallon) size, so it’s hard to find an easy way to carry it. This size is also too large to fit in any cup holders - if you want that, get the 32oz size.I tested it with iced water. It stayed ice cold for 3 days, cool for two more days, & then it was room temp.I haven’t had the chance to test it with hot, but I anticipate that it will keep it piping hot for 1.5-2 days, warm for the following 1-1.5 days, & room temp after that.The three lids allow you to have (1) a straw to drink from, (2) a canteen type spout, & (3) an insulated top [great for soups, stews, chowders, etc.].The outside finish is matte & textured. If you want smooth, Starry Indigo is not for you. I, personally, LOVE it!! It’s beautiful &, because of that, I enjoy drinking my water - which is new for me as water and I don’t usually get along.As long as the lids are closed, it will be water tight (leak proof). The only one you have to be careful of is the straw lid. If it’s not fully closed (mouth piece folded down), it will leak.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a great water bottle!
reviews.reviewText: Bought two of them with carrying pouch to take on our Icelandic hiking trip, and I am so glad I did! These things are sturdy and keep cold drinks cold for a very long time. They wash very easily thanks to a wide opening and it is very nice to have 3 different lids to choose between. I also like that the paint is textured, so it is easier to grip and doesn't slip from my hands as easily. I am very happy with this purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing water bottle
reviews.reviewText: This is the 4th one I purchase. The price for this water bottle considering the quality and accessories it brings is amazingly low. No leak, sharp looking, beautiful color, sturdy, and doesn’t sweat. I prepare it the night before with ice and water to have it ready in the morning for my son to take to school and the ice is intact. We’ve literally left it out on the kitchen counter for a few days to test how the insulation works and the ice has kept perfectly along with keeping the water cold. I highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty good, but heavy.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for airplane travel. I love the insulated carry pouch. I can fill the bottle once I’m past security, and throw it over my shoulder or across my chest to get it onto the plane. No awkward juggling as I pull my carry on with one hand and use my phone with the other to get onboard. It keeps liquid cold. I love that it included the three different lids. I use the lid with the straw on the plane, then switch to the cap top once I arrive at my destination. It takes 40 oz of water, which is a generous amount.Drawbacks: it’s heavy. Twice as heavy as the 50 oz bottle (which is also insulated stainless steel) I use at home. Also, the top with the flip top and the straw attached inside the bottle doesn’t work very well. The opening is so skinny it’s hard to get enough water through.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome hydration vessel.
reviews.reviewText: I work rt shift at amazon. Three 12 hour days, on my feet often times walking 10-15 miles per shift.This wster bitgle is amazing in its own right, keeping the ice and water intact and cool throughout the night. I fill it 3-4 times tbroughout the evening. The wide mouth and screw off top allows for easy filling with ice from the company ice machines.It dies come with three tops. One has a fold down straw top, one is a solid screw on top and the third has a slide allowing it ti be used as a sippy cup. Also comes with two additionsl straws and two straw cleaning brushes.The carry container and strap gives me a means of attaching the bottle to any carts I use at work!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well and excellent customer service
reviews.reviewText: The spout had a small issue and customer service was able to handle my issue without any problems. Sent me replacement very quickly. The water bottle is very good. Keeps the liquid cold for many hours. I even bought a smaller version of the same bottle, that's how good I felt the product was.
Me gusto aunque si es algo pesado de ahí en fuera increíble

reviews.reviewTitle: The importance to drink enough water daily
reviews.reviewText: This is amazing product that I highly recommend for everyone to have. It disciplines you to drink 2L of water daily and quietly reminds you of your goal while you put your eyes on it. I am grateful for my son who insisted me to buy it and I bought already another one to my oldest grandson who is practises basketball professionally. To summarize, that product is must have item. Thank you.
me encanto! los accesorios súper útiles, buena calidad, aun no pruebo que tanto retiene la temperatura porque suelo beber mucha agua pero el agua templada me la mantiene fresca

Es de super buen tamaño para cuando estas todo el día afuera, las bebidas se mantienen calientes o frías mucho tiempo, el bote al ser metálico es super resistente y tiene una funda que ayuda a cargarlo con facilidad y a protegerlo de raspones y golpes. Un excelente producto 👌
Es una botella muy útil para los días de mucha temperatura, es muy buena para mantener el frio o calor del liquido
